title: BYO
creator_credit: Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch and Eric Mival
brief_description: A dramatised film of a school dance where the smuggling in of alcohol causes more trouble than it is worth. A discussion starter for teenagers. Suitable for secondary school level.
